verses.verse: O praise <S%H1984><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> you nations: <S%H1471><s%> praise <S%H7623><s%> him, all <S%H3605><s%> you people. <S%H523><s%>

For his merciful <S%H2617><s%> kindness <S%H2617><s%> is great <S%H1396><s%> toward <S%H5921><s%> us: and the truth <S%H571><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> endures for ever. <S%H5769><s%> Praise <S%H1984><s%> you the LORD. <S%H3050><s%>
